messages.title: We’re backing Glasgow
messages.content: The SNP was founded in Glasgow and Glasgow is central to our vision of a fairer, more successful Scotland. We're certain that Glasgow's strong tradition of hard work, innovation, enterprise and ambition can deliver prosperity and bring new jobs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Council tax frozen, prescription charges cut and no student fees.
Business rates cut and abolished for many.
Crime cut, 1000 extra police in Glasgow.
New hospitals and schools for Glasgow.
Record investment in affordable housing. World-leading climate-change bill. Strong support for renewable energy.
Fighting to rid Scotland of nuclear weapons.

mentions.candidate: I support independence, but it must be for the people of Scotland to make that decision. - Shona School Teacher

issues.economy: We’re doing everything in our power to help. Over half our major capital projects are in and around Glasgow. There's extra funding for skills and training. But our economy is still fragile and further public spending cuts would threaten recovery.
issues.environment: World-leading climate-change bill. Strong support for renewable energy.
issues.governance: The SNP Government has published a bill to give you a say in our nation's future. A referendum will ask whether you want a more prosperous and independent Scotland. After extensive consultation and questions on both extra devolution, it will go before the Scottish Parliament with the sovereignty of the people.
issues.health: New hospitals and schools for Glasgow.
issues.socialWelfare: Council tax frozen, prescription charges cut and no student fees.

endorsements.endorsement: I support independence, but it must be for the people of Scotland to make that decision.

images.caption: We’re backing Glasgow. Alex Salmond with Nicola Sturgeon.
